summary: Tested F24 Riconciliazione system - Backend: 21/21 tests passed (100%), Frontend: All UI elements and interactions working correctly
critical_code_review_comments: f24_riconciliazione.py: Well-structured router with complete CRUD operations for F24 commercialista, alerts management, and codice tributo verification
f24_commercialista_parser.py: Comprehensive PDF parser with support for multiple F24 sections (ERARIO, INPS, REGIONI, TRIBUTI LOCALI) and ravvedimento detection
f24_parser.py: Robust quietanza parser with proper Italian number format handling
RiconciliazioneF24.jsx: Clean React component with proper state management, dashboard cards, search functionality, and filter buttons
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - tested with existing quietanze data (2 quietanze with â‚¬12,938.97 total)
context_for_next_testing_agent: F24 Riconciliazione system fully tested. APIs: GET /api/f24-riconciliazione/dashboard (statistics), GET /api/f24-riconciliazione/commercialista (list with filters), GET /api/f24-riconciliazione/verifica-codice/{codice} (codice tributo verification), GET /api/f24-riconciliazione/alerts (alerts list), POST /api/f24-riconciliazione/commercialista/upload (PDF upload), POST /api/f24-riconciliazione/alerts/{id}/conferma-elimina, POST /api/f24-riconciliazione/alerts/{id}/ignora. Frontend page at /riconciliazione-f24 with dashboard cards, search functionality, and filter buttons.

dashboard_api.returns: f24_commercialista stats, totale_da_pagare, quietanze_caricate, totale_pagato_quietanze, alerts_pendenti, f24_in_scadenza

elements: Dashboard cards (F24 Da Pagare, F24 Pagati, Quietanze Caricate, Alert Pendenti)
